name: Rail 24V
headline: 1.2 m integrated audio and lighting rail system
definition: 1.2 m linear rail combining professional lighting and full-range audio in a single 24 V DC architectural element.
description: Rail 24V is an integrated audio and lighting system designed for workplaces, residential interiors, and commercial environments. Its slim aluminium profile delivers uniform linear light alongside distributed full-range audio, allowing sound and light to function as one cohesive architectural feature.
story: Designed to simplify integration, Rail 24V replaces separate lighting fixtures and speakers with a single, clean solution. With support for multiple optics, mounting configurations, and advanced control protocols, it adapts easily to modern interiors while maintaining a refined and minimal visual presence.
drivers: 3 × 1" × 5" neodymium magnet transducers with 0.65" voice coils
